front.title: Site Mobility-Enabled Computing Aware Traffic Steering using IP address anchoring

abstract.t: The IETF CATS WG addresses the problem of how the network infrastructure can steer traffic between clients of a service and sites offering the service, considering both network metrics (such as bandwidth and latency), and compute metrics (such as processing, storage capabilities, and capacity). This document defines new extensions and procedures for a terminal hosting a site, to benefit from transparent mobility management adapting to specific connectivity and computing requirements.
